values:
Pastor Jeffery talks with CREC Pastor and translator Jan Prorok about his most recent project, J.B. Jordan’s Through New Eyes. They begin with some foundational theological and pastoral aspects of the doctrines of creation and revelation; sacramental ontology; and (mis)understandings of the doctrine of accommodation. They then pick up the thread of just one of many aspects […]

The post Through New Eyes | Jan Prorok appeared first on .
